summary.span: 提供一套機制，同步處理物件的存取。

span.span: Provides a mechanism that synchronizes access to objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可讓您取得和釋放特定物件上的鎖定，藉由呼叫由同步處理的程式碼區域的存取， ，和方法。The class allows you to synchronize access to a region of code by taking and releasing a lock on a particular object by calling the , , and methods. 物件鎖定提供限制存取的程式碼中，通常稱為重要區段區塊的能力。Object locks provide the ability to restrict access to a block of code, commonly called a critical section. 雖然執行緒擁有物件的鎖定，沒有其他執行緒可以取得該鎖定。While a thread owns the lock for an object, no other thread can acquire that lock. 您也可以使用類別，以確保沒有其他執行緒是否可存取應用程式一段程式碼正在執行的鎖定擁有者，除非另一個執行緒正在執行使用不同的鎖定的物件的程式碼。You can also use the class to ensure that no other thread is allowed to access a section of application code being executed by the lock owner, unless the other thread is executing the code using a different locked object. 本文內容：In this article: [Monitor 類別： 概觀](#Overview) [The Monitor class: An overview](#Overview) [鎖定物件](#Lock) [The lock object](#Lock) [重要區段](#CriticalSection) [The critical section](#CriticalSection) [Pulse 及 PulseAll 等候](#Pulse) [Pulse, PulseAll, and Wait](#Pulse) [監視與等候控制代碼Monitors and wait handles](#WaitHandles) ## Monitor 類別： 概觀The Monitor class: An overview 具有下列功能： has the following features: - 它是隨選物件相關聯。It is associated with an object on demand. - 它是未繫結，這表示它可以直接從任何內容進行呼叫。It is unbound, which means it can be called directly from any context. - 執行個體無法建立類別; 方法的類別都是靜態的。An instance of the class cannot be created; the methods of the class are all static. 每個方法會同步處理的物件可控制存取重要的一節。Each method is passed the synchronized object that controls access to the critical section. > [!NOTE] > 使用字串以外的鎖定物件的類別 (也就是參考型別以外)，不實值型別。Use the class to lock objects other than strings (that is, reference types other than ), not value types. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱的多載方法和[之鎖定物件](#Lock)本文稍後的章節。For details, see the overloads of the method and [The lock object](#Lock) section later in this article. 下表描述可以存取已同步處理的物件的執行緒所採取的動作：The following table describes the actions that can be taken by threads that access synchronized objects: |動作Action|描述Description| |------------|-----------------| |, , |取得物件的鎖定。Acquires a lock for an object. 此動作也會標示重要區段的開頭。This action also marks the beginning of a critical section. 沒有任何其他執行緒可以進入重要區段，除非它使用不同的鎖定的物件的重要區段中執行的指示。No other thread can enter the critical section unless it is executing the instructions in the critical section using a different locked object.| ||釋放鎖定物件以允許其他執行緒鎖定，並存取該物件。Releases the lock on an object in order to permit other threads to lock and access the object. 另一個執行緒存取的物件，就會等候呼叫執行緒。The calling thread waits while another thread accesses the object. Pulse 信號用來通知等候中執行緒的相關物件的狀態變更。Pulse signals are used to notify waiting threads about changes to an object's state.| | （信號）， (signal), |傳送訊號給一或多個等候中執行緒。Sends a signal to one or more waiting threads. 訊號通知等候的執行緒已鎖定物件的狀態已變更，並鎖定的擁有者已準備好解除鎖定。The signal notifies a waiting thread that the state of the locked object has changed, and the owner of the lock is ready to release the lock. 等候執行緒位於物件的就緒佇列，使其最終可能會接收物件的鎖定。The waiting thread is placed in the object's ready queue so that it might eventually receive the lock for the object. 一旦執行緒擁有鎖定，它可以檢查以查看是否已到達所需的狀態物件的新狀態。Once the thread has the lock, it can check the new state of the object to see if the required state has been reached.| ||釋放物件上的鎖定。Releases the lock on an object. 此動作也會標示重要區段保護鎖定物件的結尾。This action also marks the end of a critical section protected by the locked object.| 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，有兩組多載和方法。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], there are two sets of overloads for the and methods. 有一組多載`ref`（在 C# 中) 或`ByRef`（在 Visual Basic)參數，自動設定為`true`如果已取得鎖定，即使取得鎖定時，會擲回例外狀況。One set of overloads has a `ref` (in C#) or `ByRef` (in Visual Basic) parameter that is atomically set to `true` if the lock is acquired, even if an exception is thrown when acquiring the lock. 它是很重要，即使鎖定所保護的資源可能未處於一致的狀態，釋放在所有情況下，鎖定，請使用這些多載。Use these overloads if it is critical to release the lock in all cases, even when the resources the lock is protecting might not be in a consistent state. ## 鎖定物件The lock object Monitor 類別組成`static`（在 C# 中) 或`Shared`（在 Visual Basic)，控制的存取重要區段物件操作的方法。The Monitor class consists of `static` (in C#) or `Shared` (in Visual Basic) methods that operate on an object that controls access to the critical section. 每個同步處理的物件，並維護的下列資訊：The following information is maintained for each synchronized object: - 目前擁有鎖定的執行緒參考。A reference to the thread that currently holds the lock. - 就緒佇列，其中包含已準備好取得鎖定的執行緒參考。A reference to a ready queue, which contains the threads that are ready to obtain the lock. - 等候佇列，其中包含正在等候的鎖定物件的狀態變更通知的執行緒參考。A reference to a waiting queue, which contains the threads that are waiting for notification of a change in the state of the locked object. 會鎖定物件 (也就是參考類型)，而不會鎖定值類型。 locks objects (that is, reference types), not value types. 雖然您可以傳遞值類型到 和 ，它會個別針對每個呼叫進行 boxed 處理。While you can pass a value type to and , it is boxed separately for each call. 因為每個呼叫會建立不同的物件， 絕不會封鎖，且它應該要保護的程式碼不會真地同步處理。Since each call creates a separate object, never blocks, and the code it is supposedly protecting is not really synchronized. 此外，傳遞給 的物件不同於傳遞給 的物件，因此 會擲回 例外狀況，以及訊息「從未同步處理的程式碼區塊呼叫物件同步化方法」。In addition, the object passed to is different from the object passed to , so throws exception with the message "Object synchronization method was called from an unsynchronized block of code." 下列範例說明此問題。The following example illustrates this problem. 它會啟動 10 個工作，其中每個工作睡眠 250 毫秒。It launches ten tasks, each of which just sleeps for 250 milliseconds. 每一項工作接著會更新計數器變數 `nTasks`，這是要計算實際啟動並執行的工作數目。Each task then updates a counter variable, `nTasks`, which is intended to count the number of tasks that actually launched and executed. 由於 `nTasks` 是可以同時由多個工作更新的全域變數，因此使用監視器來防止多個工作同時修改。Because `nTasks` is a global variable that can be updated by multiple tasks simultaneously, a monitor is used to protect it from simultaneous modification by multiple tasks. 不過，如範例的輸出所示，每項工作都擲回 例外狀況。However, as the output from the example shows, each of the tasks throws a exception. [!code-csharp[Conceptual.Monitors#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/conceptual.monitors/cs/badlock1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Conceptual.Monitors#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/conceptual.monitors/vb/badlock1.vb#2)] 每個工作都擲回 例外狀況是因為 `nTasks` 變數在呼叫每個工作中的 方法之前會進行 boxed 處理。Each task throws a exception because the `nTasks` variable is boxed before the call to the method in each task. 換句話說，每個方法呼叫都被傳遞個別的變數，且與其他變數無關。In other words, each method call is passed a separate variable that is independent of the others. `nTasks` 在呼叫 方法時會再次進行 boxed 處理。`nTasks` is boxed again in the call to the method. 同樣地，這會建立十個彼此獨立的新 boxed 變數 `nTasks`，以及在呼叫 方法時建立的十個 boxed 變數。Once again, this creates ten new boxed variables, which are independent of each other, `nTasks`, and the ten boxed variables created in the call to the method. 接著便擲回例外狀況，因為我們的程式碼嘗試對於先前未鎖定的新建變數釋放鎖定。The exception is thrown, then, because our code is attempting to release a lock on a newly created variable that was not previously locked. 雖然您可以先將值類型變數進行 box 處理，然後再呼叫 和 ，如下列範例所示，並將相同的 boxed 物件傳遞給這兩種方法，但這麼做並沒有任何益處。Although you can box a value type variable before calling and , as shown in the following example, and pass the same boxed object to both methods, there is no advantage to doing this. 變更 unboxed 變數不會反映在 boxed 複本，且沒有任何方法可變更 boxed 複本的值。Changes to the unboxed variable are not reflected in the boxed copy, and there is no way to change the value of the boxed copy. [!code-csharp[Conceptual.Monitors#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/conceptual.monitors/cs/badbox1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Conceptual.Monitors#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/conceptual.monitors/vb/badbox1.vb#3)] 選取要同步處理的物件，您應該只鎖定私用或內部的物件。When selecting an object on which to synchronize, you should lock only on private or internal objects. 外部物件上的鎖定可能會導致死結，因為不相關的程式碼可以選擇要針對不同用途鎖定相同物件。Locking on external objects might result in deadlocks, because unrelated code could choose the same objects to lock on for different purposes. 請注意，您可以同步處理多個應用程式定義域中的物件如果用於鎖定的物件衍生自。Note that you can synchronize on an object in multiple application domains if the object used for the lock derives from . ## 重要區段The critical section 使用和標記開頭和結尾的重要區段的方法。Use the and methods to mark the beginning and end of a critical section. > [!NOTE] > 所提供的功能並方法等同於所提供的[鎖定](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/lock-statement.md)在 C# 中的陳述式和[SyncLock](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/synclock-statement.md)以外，在 Visual Basic 中的陳述式語言建構包裝方法多載而方法中的`try`...`finally`The functionality provided by the and methods is identical to that provided by the [lock](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/lock-statement.md) statement in C# and the [SyncLock](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/synclock-statement.md) statement in Visual Basic, except that the language constructs wrap the method overload and the method in a `try`…`finally` 若要確保此監視器會釋出區塊。block to ensure that the monitor is released. 如果關鍵區段是一組連續的指示，然後取得的鎖定方法可確保只有單一執行緒可以執行括住的程式碼與鎖定的物件。If the critical section is a set of contiguous instructions, then the lock acquired by the method guarantees that only a single thread can execute the enclosed code with the locked object. 在此情況下，我們建議您將放在該程式碼`try`封鎖，並呼叫方法中的`finally`區塊。In this case, we recommend that you place that code in a `try` block and place the call to the method in a `finally` block. 這可確保即使發生例外狀況，就會釋放鎖定。This ensures that the lock is released even if an exception occurs. 下列程式碼片段會示範這個模式。The following code fragment illustrates this pattern. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Monitor.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.monitor.class/cs/Pattern2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Monitor.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.monitor.class/vb/Pattern2.vb#2)] 這項功能通常用來同步處理存取設為靜態或類別的執行個體方法。This facility is typically used to synchronize access to a static or instance method of a class. 鎖定功能如果重要區段跨越整個方法，可藉由將放方法，並指定建構函式中的值。If a critical section spans an entire method, the locking facility can be achieved by placing the on the method, and specifying the value in the constructor of . 當您使用這個屬性，和方法呼叫則不需要。When you use this attribute, the and method calls are not needed. 下列程式碼片段會說明這種模式：The following code fragment illustrates this pattern: [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Monitor.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.monitor.class/cs/Pattern2.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Monitor.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.monitor.class/vb/Pattern2.vb#3)] 請注意，此屬性會使目前的執行緒持有的鎖定，直到此方法會傳回;如果可以更快解除鎖定，使用類別，C#[鎖定](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/lock-statement.md)陳述式或 Visual Basic [SyncLock](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/synclock-statement.md)方法，而不是屬性內的陳述式。Note that the attribute causes the current thread to hold the lock until the method returns; if the lock can be released sooner, use the class, the C# [lock](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/lock-statement.md) statement, or the Visual Basic [SyncLock](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/synclock-statement.md) statement inside of the method instead of the attribute. 雖然您可以針對和鎖定並釋放跨成員或類別界限或兩者的指定的物件的陳述式，不建議這種做法。While it is possible for the and statements that lock and release a given object to cross member or class boundaries or both, this practice is not recommended. ## Pulse 及 PulseAll 等候Pulse, PulseAll, and Wait 一旦執行緒擁有鎖定，而且已進入鎖定保護重要區段，它可以呼叫， ，和方法。Once a thread owns the lock and has entered the critical section that the lock protects, it can call the , , and methods. 釋出鎖定，如果保留，可讓等候中的執行緒或執行緒取得鎖定，並進入重要區段，並等候通知的呼叫所或方法。 releases the lock if it is held, allows a waiting thread or threads to obtain the lock and enter the critical section, and waits to be notified by a call to the or method. 當 收到通知時，它會傳回並再一次取得鎖定。When is notified, it returns and obtains the lock again. 和 都會傳送訊號，以便等候佇列中的下一個執行緒能繼續。Both and signal for the next thread in the wait queue to proceed. ## 監視與等候控制代碼Monitors and wait handles 請務必注意使用之間的差別類別和物件。It is important to note the distinction between the use of the class and objects. - 類別是純粹 managed、 完全可攜性，而且可能是作業系統資源需求方面更有效率。The class is purely managed, fully portable, and might be more efficient in terms of operating-system resource requirements. - 物件代表作業系統可等候物件、適用於 managed 和 unmanaged 程式碼之間的同步處理，並且公開一些進階的作業系統功能，例如一次等候許多物件的能力。 objects represent operating-system waitable objects, are useful for synchronizing between managed and unmanaged code, and expose some advanced operating-system features like the ability to wait on many objects at once. ## Examples 下列範例會使用類別來同步存取所代表的隨機號碼產生器的單一執行個體類別。The following example uses the class to synchronize access to a single instance of a random number generator represented by the class. 此範例會建立 10 個工作，其中每一個執行緒集區執行緒以非同步方式執行。The example creates ten tasks, each of which executes asynchronously on a thread pool thread. 每個工作會產生 10,000 個隨機數字，計算其平均值，然後更新維護加總產生的隨機數字的數目和其總和的兩個程序層級變數。Each task generates 10,000 random numbers, calculates their average, and updates two procedure-level variables that maintain a running total of the number of random numbers generated and their sum. 尚未執行所有工作之後，這兩個值然後用來計算整體的平均值。After all tasks have executed, these two values are then used to calculate the overall mean. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Monitor.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.monitor.class/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Monitor.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.monitor.class/vb/example1.vb#1)] 從任何執行緒集區執行緒上執行的工作，可以存取它們，因為存取變數`total`和`n`也必須同步處理。Because they can be accessed from any task running on a thread pool thread, access to the variables `total` and `n` must also be synchronized. 方法適用於此目的。The method is used for this purpose. 下列範例示範如何結合的使用類別 (實作`lock`或`SyncLock`語言建構)，則類別，而類別。The following example demonstrates the combined use of the class (implemented with the `lock` or `SyncLock` language construct), the class, and the class. 它會定義兩個`internal`（在 C# 中) 或`Friend`（在 Visual Basic) 類別`SyncResource`和`UnSyncResource`，分別提供同步和非同步存取資源。It defines two `internal` (in C#) or `Friend` (in Visual Basic) classes, `SyncResource` and `UnSyncResource`, that respectively provide synchronized and unsynchronized access to a resource. 為了確保範例說明同步和非同步存取 （這可能是因為如果每個方法呼叫都迅速完成） 之間的差異，此方法包含隨機的延遲： 針對執行緒的屬性為偶數，方法呼叫引入 2,000 毫秒的延遲。To ensure that the example illustrates the difference between the synchronized and unsynchronized access (which could be the case if each method call completes rapidly), the method includes a random delay: for threads whose property is even, the method calls to introduce a delay of 2,000 milliseconds. 請注意，因為`SyncResource`類別不是公用的沒有任何用戶端程式碼在同步處理的資源上取得鎖定; 內部類別本身會取得鎖定。Note that, because the `SyncResource` class is not public, none of the client code takes a lock on the synchronized resource; the internal class itself takes the lock. 這可防止惡意程式碼在公開物件上取得鎖定。This prevents malicious code from taking a lock on a public object. [!code-csharp[Conceptual.Monitors#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/conceptual.monitors/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Conceptual.Monitors#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/conceptual.monitors/vb/source.vb#1)] 此範例會定義一個變數， `numOps`，定義會嘗試存取資源的執行緒數目。The example defines a variable, `numOps`, that defines the number of threads that will attempt to access the resource. 應用程式執行緒呼叫方法的同步和非同步存取五次每一個。The application thread calls the method for synchronized and unsynchronized access five times each. 方法具有單一參數，會接受任何參數，且不傳回值的委派。The method has a single parameter, a delegate that accepts no parameters and returns no value. 針對同步存取，它會叫用`SyncUpdateResource`方法; 針對未同步存取，它會叫用`UnSyncUpdateResource`方法。For synchronized access, it invokes the `SyncUpdateResource` method; for unsynchronized access, it invokes the `UnSyncUpdateResource` method. 在方法呼叫的每個設定之後呼叫的應用程式執行緒[AutoResetEvent.WaitOne](xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne*)方法，以封鎖直到執行個體收到訊號。After each set of method calls, the application thread calls the [AutoResetEvent.WaitOne](xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne*) method so that it blocks until the instance is signaled. 每次呼叫`SyncUpdateResource`方法都會呼叫內部`SyncResource.Access`方法，然後呼叫方法，以遞減`numOps`計數器。Each call to the `SyncUpdateResource` method calls the internal `SyncResource.Access` method and then calls the method to decrement the `numOps` counter. 方法會用於遞減計數器，因為否則您無法確定第二個執行緒將會存取值，才能在第一個執行緒的遞減值儲存在變數。The method Is used to decrement the counter, because otherwise you cannot be certain that a second thread will access the value before a first thread's decremented value has been stored in the variable. 當上次同步處理背景工作執行緒遞減計數器為零時，表示所有同步處理的執行緒已完成存取資源，`SyncUpdateResource`方法呼叫方法，以指示主執行緒繼續執行執行。When the last synchronized worker thread decrements the counter to zero, indicating that all synchronized threads have completed accessing the resource, the `SyncUpdateResource` method calls the method, which signals the main thread to continue execution. 每次呼叫`UnSyncUpdateResource`方法都會呼叫內部`UnSyncResource.Access`方法，然後呼叫方法，以遞減`numOps`計數器。Each call to the `UnSyncUpdateResource` method calls the internal `UnSyncResource.Access` method and then calls the method to decrement the `numOps` counter. 同樣地，方法會用於遞減計數器，以確保第二個執行緒不會無法存取值在第一個執行緒的遞減值已指派給變數之前。Once again, the method Is used to decrement the counter to ensure that a second thread does not access the value before a first thread's decremented value has been assigned to the variable. 當上次非同步處理背景工作執行緒遞減計數器為零時，指出沒有其他非同步處理的執行緒需要存取資源，`UnSyncUpdateResource`方法呼叫方法，以指示主執行緒繼續執行.When the last unsynchronized worker thread decrements the counter to zero, indicating that no more unsynchronized threads need to access the resource, the `UnSyncUpdateResource` method calls the method, which signals the main thread to continue execution. 如範例輸出所示，同步存取可確保呼叫執行緒會先結束受保護的資源，其他執行緒才能存取該資源；每個執行緒都會等候其前置項。As the output from the example shows, synchronized access ensures that the calling thread exits the protected resource before another thread can access it; each thread waits on its predecessor. 相反地，若未鎖定，`UnSyncResource.Access`執行緒到達它的順序呼叫方法。On the other hand, without the lock, the `UnSyncResource.Access` method is called in the order in which threads reach it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`Enter`取得上做為參數傳遞的物件。Use `Enter` to acquire the on the object passed as the parameter. 如果已執行另一個執行緒`Enter`物件上但尚未執行對應，目前的執行緒將會封鎖直到另一個執行緒釋放物件。If another thread has executed an `Enter` on the object but has not yet executed the corresponding , the current thread will block until the other thread releases the object. 它是合法的叫用相同的執行緒`Enter`不止一次，而不封鎖它; 不過，相同數目的`Exit`物件正在等候其他執行緒會解除封鎖之前，必須叫用呼叫。It is legal for the same thread to invoke `Enter` more than once without it blocking; however, an equal number of `Exit` calls must be invoked before other threads waiting on the object will unblock. 使用鎖定物件 （也就是參考類型），不實值型別。Use to lock objects (that is, reference types), not value types. 當您傳遞到實值類型變數`Enter`，它會進行 boxed 處理做為物件。When you pass a value type variable to `Enter`, it is boxed as an object. 如果您傳遞至相同的變數`Enter`同樣地，它會進行 boxed 處理為個別的物件，而且不會封鎖執行緒。If you pass the same variable to `Enter` again, it is boxed as a separate object, and the thread does not block. 在此情況下，程式碼，`Monitor`是應該要保護不受保護。In this case, the code that `Monitor` is supposedly protecting is not protected. 此外，當您將變數傳遞給`Exit`，建立另一個不同的物件。Furthermore, when you pass the variable to `Exit`, still another separate object is created. 因為物件傳遞給`Exit`不同於傳遞至物件`Enter`，`Monitor`就會擲回。Because the object passed to `Exit` is different from the object passed to `Enter`, `Monitor` throws . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱概念性主題[監視器](xref:System.Threading.Monitor)。For more information, see the conceptual topic [Monitors](xref:System.Threading.Monitor). 可插斷的執行緒正在等候輸入`Monitor`物件上。 can interrupt threads that are waiting to enter a `Monitor` on an object. A就會擲回。A will be thrown. 使用 C# `try`...`finally`Use a C# `try`…`finally` 區塊 (`Try`...`Finally`block (`Try`…`Finally` 在 Visual Basic)，以確保您發行 「 監視器 」，或使用 C#`lock`陳述式 (`SyncLock`陳述式，在 Visual Basic 中的)，其中包裝並中的方法`try`...`finally`in Visual Basic) to ensure that you release the monitor, or use the C# `lock` statement (`SyncLock` statement in Visual Basic), which wraps the and methods in a `try`…`finally` 區塊。block. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用 `Enter` 方法。The following example demonstrates how to use the `Enter` method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`Enter`來取得做為傳遞的物件上`obj`參數。Use `Enter` to acquire the on the object passed as the `obj` parameter. 如果已執行另一個執行緒`Enter`物件上但尚未執行對應，目前的執行緒將會封鎖直到另一個執行緒釋放物件。If another thread has executed an `Enter` on the object but has not yet executed the corresponding , the current thread will block until the other thread releases the object. 它是合法的叫用相同的執行緒`Enter`不止一次，而不封鎖它; 不過，相同數目的`Exit`物件正在等候其他執行緒會解除封鎖之前，必須叫用呼叫。It is legal for the same thread to invoke `Enter` more than once without it blocking; however, an equal number of `Exit` calls must be invoked before other threads waiting on the object will unblock. 如果無法取得鎖定，因為發生例外狀況，針對指定的變數`lockTaken`參數是`false`這個方法會結束之後。If the lock was not taken because an exception was thrown, the variable specified for the `lockTaken` parameter is `false` after this method ends. 這可讓程式，以判斷是否需要釋出鎖定，請在所有情況下。This allows the program to determine, in all cases, whether it is necessary to release the lock. 如果這個方法會傳回而不擲回例外狀況，針對指定的變數`lockTaken`參數永遠是`true`，並不需要進行測試。If this method returns without throwing an exception, the variable specified for the `lockTaken` parameter is always `true`, and there is no need to test it. 使用鎖定物件 （也就是參考類型），不實值型別。Use to lock objects (that is, reference types), not value types. 當您傳遞到實值類型變數`Enter`，它會進行 boxed 處理做為物件。When you pass a value type variable to `Enter`, it is boxed as an object. 如果您傳遞至相同的變數`Enter`同樣地，它會進行 boxed 處理為個別的物件，而且不會封鎖執行緒。If you pass the same variable to `Enter` again, it is boxed as a separate object, and the thread does not block. 在此情況下，程式碼，`Monitor`是應該要保護不受保護。In this case, the code that `Monitor` is supposedly protecting is not protected. 此外，當您將變數傳遞給`Exit`，建立另一個不同的物件。Furthermore, when you pass the variable to `Exit`, another separate object is created. 因為物件傳遞給`Exit`不同於傳遞至物件`Enter`，`Monitor`就會擲回。Because the object passed to `Exit` is different from the object passed to `Enter`, `Monitor` throws . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱概念性主題[監視器](xref:System.Threading.Monitor)。For more information, see the conceptual topic [Monitors](xref:System.Threading.Monitor). 可插斷的執行緒正在等候輸入`Monitor`物件上。 can interrupt threads that are waiting to enter a `Monitor` on an object. A就會擲回。A will be thrown. ## Examples 下列程式碼示範基本模式使用方法多載。The following code shows the basic pattern for using the method overload. 這個多載一定會設定傳遞至變數的值`ref`參數 (`ByRef` Visual Basic 中) `lockTaken`，即使方法會擲回例外狀況，因此變數的值是以可靠的方式，來測試是否鎖定必須為釋出。This overload always sets the value of the variable that is passed to the `ref` parameter (`ByRef` in Visual Basic) `lockTaken`, even if the method throws an exception, so the value of the variable is a reliable way to test whether the lock has to be released. remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫的執行緒必須在擁有鎖定`obj`參數。The calling thread must own the lock on the `obj` parameter. 如果呼叫的執行緒擁有之指定的物件上的鎖定，且有相同數目的`Exit`和呼叫物件，然後釋放鎖定為止。If the calling thread owns the lock on the specified object, and has made an equal number of `Exit` and calls for the object, then the lock is released. 如果呼叫執行緒已不會叫用`Exit`次數一樣多`Enter`，不會釋放鎖定。If the calling thread has not invoked `Exit` as many times as `Enter`, the lock is not released. 如果解除鎖定其他執行緒處於就緒佇列物件，其中一個執行緒取得鎖定。If the lock is released and other threads are in the ready queue for the object, one of the threads acquires the lock. 如果其他執行緒在等候取得鎖定的等候佇列中，它們不會自動移動到就緒佇列時的鎖定擁有者會呼叫`Exit`。If other threads are in the waiting queue waiting to acquire the lock, they are not automatically moved to the ready queue when the owner of the lock calls `Exit`. 若要一或多個等候執行緒進入就緒佇列，呼叫或是叫用之前`Exit`。To move one or more waiting threads into the ready queue, call or before invoking `Exit`. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用 `Exit` 方法。The following example demonstrates how to use the `Exit` method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有目前鎖定的擁有者可以發出信號，使用等候物件`Pulse`。Only the current owner of the lock can signal a waiting object using `Pulse`. 目前擁有指定的物件上鎖定的執行緒叫用這個方法來通知鎖定的行中的下一個執行緒。The thread that currently owns the lock on the specified object invokes this method to signal the next thread in line for the lock. 在收到的 pulse 時，等候的執行緒會移到就緒佇列。Upon receiving the pulse, the waiting thread is moved to the ready queue. 當執行緒叫用`Pulse`釋出鎖定，準備佇列 （也就是不一定接受 pulse 的執行緒） 中的下一個執行緒取得鎖定。When the thread that invoked `Pulse` releases the lock, the next thread in the ready queue (which is not necessarily the thread that was pulsed) acquires the lock. > [!IMPORTANT] > 類別不會維護狀態，指出已呼叫方法。The class does not maintain state indicating that the method has been called. 因此，如果您呼叫當沒有執行緒在等候下, 一個呼叫的執行緒區塊如同從未呼叫。Thus, if you call when no threads are waiting, the next thread that calls blocks as if had never been called. 如果使用兩個執行緒和互動，這可能導致死結。If two threads are using and to interact, this could result in a deadlock. 與此相反的行為與類別： 如果您通知藉由呼叫其方法，沒有執行緒在等待，而仍會處於收到信號的狀態，直到執行緒呼叫， ，或。Contrast this with the behavior of the class: If you signal an by calling its method, and there are no threads waiting, the remains in a signaled state until a thread calls , , or . 釋放該執行緒，並傳回未發出訊號的狀態。The releases that thread and returns to the unsignaled state. 請注意 同步處理的物件擁有數個的參考，包括目前持有鎖定、 參考到就緒佇列，其中包含已準備好取得鎖定的執行緒，以及參考的等候佇列之執行緒的參考它包含執行緒等候的物件的狀態變更通知。Note that a synchronized object holds several references, including a reference to the thread that currently holds the lock, a reference to the ready queue, which contains the threads that are ready to obtain the lock, and a reference to the waiting queue, which contains the threads that are waiting for notification of a change in the object's state. `Pulse`， ，和方法必須從叫用同步處理的程式碼區塊中。The `Pulse`, , and methods must be invoked from within a synchronized block of code. 若要表示多個執行緒，使用方法。To signal multiple threads, use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果成功，這個方法會取得獨佔的鎖定上`obj`參數。If successful, this method acquires an exclusive lock on the `obj` parameter. 這個方法會立即傳回，鎖定可用。This method returns immediately, whether or not the lock is available. 這個方法很類似，但它會永遠不會封鎖目前的執行緒。This method is similar to , but it will never block the current thread. 如果執行緒無法輸入而不會封鎖，則方法會傳回`false,`。If the thread cannot enter without blocking, the method returns `false,`. > [!NOTE] > 使用鎖定物件 （也就是參考類型），不實值型別。Use to lock objects (that is, reference types), not value types. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文章。For details, see the article. 若要確保執行緒不會進入重要區段，您應該檢查方法的傳回值，並在重要區段中執行程式碼，其傳回值時，才`true`。To ensure that the thread does not enter the critical section, you should examine the method's return value and execute code in the critical section only if its return value is `true`. 下列程式碼片段會顯示用來呼叫這個方法的模式。The following code fragment shows the pattern used to call this method. 請注意，您應該呼叫在`finally`區塊以確保呼叫執行緒釋放重要區段上的鎖定，如果發生例外狀況。Note that you should call in a `finally` block to ensure that the calling thread releases its lock on the critical section if an exception occurs. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果成功，這個方法會取得獨佔的鎖定上`obj`參數。If successful, this method acquires an exclusive lock on the `obj` parameter. 這個方法會立即傳回，鎖定可用。This method returns immediately, whether or not the lock is available. 如果無法取得鎖定，因為發生例外狀況，針對指定的變數`lockTaken`參數是`false`這個方法會結束之後。If the lock was not taken because an exception was thrown, the variable specified for the `lockTaken` parameter is `false` after this method ends. 這可讓程式，以判斷是否需要釋出鎖定，請在所有情況下。This allows the program to determine, in all cases, whether it is necessary to release the lock. 這個方法很類似，但它會永遠不會封鎖目前的執行緒。This method is similar to , but it will never block the current thread. 如果執行緒無法輸入而不會封鎖，`lockTaken`引數設定為`false`方法傳回時。If the thread cannot enter without blocking, the `lockTaken` argument is set to `false` when the method returns. > [!NOTE] > 使用鎖定物件 （也就是參考類型），不實值型別。Use to lock objects (that is, reference types), not value types. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文章。For more information, see the article. 為了確保執行緒不會進入重要區段，您應該檢查的值`lockTaken`並執行程式碼在重要區段中，只有其值是`true`。To ensure that the thread does not enter the critical section, you should examine the value of `lockTaken` and execute code in the critical section only if its value is `true`. 下列程式碼片段會顯示用來呼叫這個方法的模式。The following code fragment shows the pattern used to call this method. 請注意，您應該呼叫在`finally`區塊以確保呼叫執行緒釋放重要區段上的鎖定，如果發生例外狀況。Note that you should call in a `finally` block to ensure that the calling thread releases its lock on the critical section if an exception occurs. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Monitor.TryEnter#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Threading.Monitor.TryEnter/cs/pattern1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Monitor.TryEnter#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Threading.Monitor.TryEnter/vb/pattern1.vb#2)] ## Examples 下列程式碼示範基本模式使用方法多載。The following code shows the basic pattern for using the method overload. 這個多載一定會設定傳遞至變數的值`ref`參數 (`ByRef` Visual Basic 中) `lockTaken`，即使方法會擲回例外狀況，因此變數的值是以可靠的方式，來測試是否鎖定必須為釋出。This overload always sets the value of the variable that is passed to the `ref` parameter (`ByRef` in Visual Basic) `lockTaken`, even if the method throws an exception, so the value of the variable is a reliable way to test whether the lock has to be released. static member Wait : obj -> bool

param.name: obj
param.span: 要等候的物件。

span.span: The object on which to wait.

summary.span: 釋出物件的鎖並且封鎖目前的執行緒，直到這個執行緒重新取得鎖定為止。

span.span: Releases the lock on an object and blocks the current thread until it reacquires the lock.

returns.span: 如果因為呼叫端重新取得指定物件的鎖定所以呼叫被傳回，則為 。

span.span: if the call returned because the caller reacquired the lock for the specified object.

returns.span: 如果鎖定不被重新取得，則這個方法不會傳回。

span.span: This method does not return if the lock is not reacquired.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前擁有指定的物件上鎖定的執行緒叫用此方法，以便釋出物件，另一個執行緒可以存取它。The thread that currently owns the lock on the specified object invokes this method in order to release the object so that another thread can access it. 等候重新取得鎖定時，會封鎖呼叫端。The caller is blocked while waiting to reacquire the lock. 當呼叫端需要等待，因為另一個執行緒的作業而造成狀態變更時，會呼叫這個方法。This method is called when the caller needs to wait for a state change that will occur as a result of another thread's operations. 當執行緒呼叫`Wait`，它會釋放該物件上的鎖定，並進入物件的等候佇列。When a thread calls `Wait`, it releases the lock on the object and enters the object's waiting queue. 物件的就緒佇列中的下一個執行緒 （如果有的話） 取得鎖定並會獨佔使用的物件。The next thread in the object's ready queue (if there is one) acquires the lock and has exclusive use of the object. 所有呼叫的執行緒`Wait`仍在等待佇列，直到它們收到信號，以從或、 鎖定的擁有者所傳送。All threads that call `Wait` remain in the waiting queue until they receive a signal from or , sent by the owner of the lock. 如果`Pulse`傳送時，只有在等候佇列頂端的執行緒會受到影響。If `Pulse` is sent, only the thread at the head of the waiting queue is affected. 如果`PulseAll`傳送時，會等候物件的所有執行緒會受到都影響。If `PulseAll` is sent, all threads that are waiting for the object are affected. 收到訊號時，一或多個執行緒會離開等候佇列，並進入就緒佇列。When the signal is received, one or more threads leave the waiting queue and enter the ready queue. 就緒佇列中的執行緒可以重新取得鎖定。A thread in the ready queue is permitted to reacquire the lock. 這個方法傳回時呼叫的執行緒重新取得鎖定的物件上。This method returns when the calling thread reacquires the lock on the object. 請注意，此方法會無限期地封鎖如果鎖定的持有者不會呼叫`Pulse`或`PulseAll`。Note that this method blocks indefinitely if the holder of the lock does not call `Pulse` or `PulseAll`. 呼叫端執行`Wait`一次，不論次數已叫用指定的物件。The caller executes `Wait` once, regardless of the number of times has been invoked for the specified object. 就概念而言，`Wait`方法將儲存在呼叫端叫用次數`Enter`物件上叫用`Exit`次數所需的完全釋放鎖定的物件。Conceptually, the `Wait` method stores the number of times the caller invoked `Enter` on the object and invokes `Exit` as many times as necessary to fully release the locked object. 呼叫端會再封鎖等候重新取得物件時。The caller then blocks while waiting to reacquire the object. 當呼叫端重新取得鎖定時，系統就會呼叫`Enter`所需的還原已儲存次數`Enter`呼叫端的計數。When the caller reacquires the lock, the system calls `Enter` as many times as necessary to restore the saved `Enter` count for the caller. 呼叫`Wait`解除鎖定指定的物件; 如果呼叫端的其他物件的鎖定擁有者，會釋放這些鎖定不。Calling `Wait` releases the lock for the specified object only; if the caller is the owner of locks on other objects, these locks are not released. 請注意 同步處理的物件擁有數個的參考，包括目前持有鎖定、 參考到就緒佇列，其中包含已準備好取得鎖定的執行緒，以及參考的等候佇列之執行緒的參考它包含執行緒等候的物件的狀態變更通知。Note that a synchronized object holds several references, including a reference to the thread that currently holds the lock, a reference to the ready queue, which contains the threads that are ready to obtain the lock, and a reference to the waiting queue, which contains the threads that are waiting for notification of a change in the object's state. ， ，和`Wait`方法必須從叫用同步處理的程式碼區塊中。The , , and `Wait` methods must be invoked from within a synchronized block of code. 如 < 備註 >方法說明發生什麼事如果沒有執行緒在等候時，會呼叫。The remarks for the method explain what happens if is called when no threads are waiting.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool Wait (object obj, int millisecondsTimeout);

Public Shared Function Wait (obj As Object, millisecondsTimeout As Integer) As Boolean
public: static bool Wait(System::Object ^ obj, int millisecondsTimeout);
static member Wait : obj * int -> bool

param.name: obj
param.span: 要等候的物件。

span.span: The object on which to wait.

param.name: millisecondsTimeout
param.span: 在執行緒進入就緒佇列之前要等候的毫秒數。

span.span: The number of milliseconds to wait before the thread enters the ready queue.

summary.span: 釋出物件的鎖並且封鎖目前的執行緒，直到這個執行緒重新取得鎖定為止。

span.span: Releases the lock on an object and blocks the current thread until it reacquires the lock.

summary.span: 如果超過指定的逾時間隔時間，執行緒會進入就緒序列。

span.span: If the specified time-out interval elapses, the thread enters the ready queue.

returns.span: 如果在經過指定的時間之前重新取得鎖定，則為 ；如果在經過指定的時間之後重新取得鎖定，則為 。

span.span: if the lock was reacquired before the specified time elapsed; if the lock was reacquired after the specified time elapsed.

returns.span: 要等到重新取得鎖定之後，此方法才會傳回。

span.span: The method does not return until the lock is reacquired.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不會傳回在重新取得獨佔鎖定直到`obj`參數。This method does not return until it reacquires an exclusive lock on the `obj` parameter. 目前擁有指定的物件上鎖定的執行緒叫用此方法，以便釋出物件，另一個執行緒可以存取它。The thread that currently owns the lock on the specified object invokes this method in order to release the object so that another thread can access it. 等候重新取得鎖定時，會封鎖呼叫端。The caller is blocked while waiting to reacquire the lock. 當呼叫端需要等待，因為另一個執行緒的作業而造成狀態變更時，會呼叫這個方法。This method is called when the caller needs to wait for a state change that will occur as a result of another thread's operations. 逾時可確保目前的執行緒在如果另一個執行緒釋放的鎖定，但是未先呼叫不會無限期地封鎖或方法。The time-out ensures that the current thread does not block indefinitely if another thread releases the lock without first calling the or method. 它也會在執行緒移動到就緒佇列，以便它可以更快重新取得鎖定，請略過它之前等候佇列中的其他執行緒。It also moves the thread to the ready queue, bypassing other threads ahead of it in the wait queue, so that it can reacquire the lock sooner. 執行緒可以測試的傳回值方法，以判斷它是否重新取得鎖定之前的逾時。執行緒可以評估導致它進入等候條件，才需要呼叫方法一次。The thread can test the return value of the method to determine whether it reacquired the lock prior to the time-out. The thread can evaluate the conditions that caused it to enter the wait, and if necessary call the method again. 當執行緒呼叫`Wait`，它會釋放該物件上的鎖定，並進入物件的等候佇列。When a thread calls `Wait`, it releases the lock on the object and enters the object's waiting queue. 物件的就緒佇列中的下一個執行緒 （如果有的話） 取得鎖定並會獨佔使用的物件。The next thread in the object's ready queue (if there is one) acquires the lock and has exclusive use of the object. 叫用的執行緒`Wait`仍會保留在等候佇列，直到保留鎖定的執行緒叫用，或它是在佇列中的下一步，並保留鎖定的執行緒叫用。The thread that invoked `Wait` remains in the waiting queue until either a thread that holds the lock invokes , or it is the next in the queue and a thread that holds the lock invokes . 不過，如果`millisecondsTimeout`另一個執行緒叫用這個物件的前經過或方法，原始執行緒時，會移到就緒佇列上，才能重新取得鎖定。However, if `millisecondsTimeout` elapses before another thread invokes this object's or method, the original thread is moved to the ready queue in order to regain the lock. > [!NOTE] > 如果指定了`millisecondsTimeout`參數，此方法會封鎖無限期地鎖定的持有者會呼叫除非或。If is specified for the `millisecondsTimeout` parameter, this method blocks indefinitely unless the holder of the lock calls or . 如果`millisecondsTimeout`等於 0，呼叫的執行緒`Wait`釋出鎖定，然後才能重新取得鎖定立即進入就緒佇列。If `millisecondsTimeout` equals 0, the thread that calls `Wait` releases the lock and then immediately enters the ready queue in order to regain the lock. 呼叫端執行`Wait`一次，不論次數已叫用指定的物件。The caller executes `Wait` once, regardless of the number of times has been invoked for the specified object. 就概念而言，`Wait`方法將儲存在呼叫端叫用次數物件上叫用次數所需的完全釋放鎖定的物件。Conceptually, the `Wait` method stores the number of times the caller invoked on the object and invokes as many times as necessary to fully release the locked object. 呼叫端會再封鎖等候重新取得物件時。The caller then blocks while waiting to reacquire the object. 當呼叫端重新取得鎖定時，系統就會呼叫所需的還原已儲存次數呼叫端的計數。When the caller reacquires the lock, the system calls as many times as necessary to restore the saved count for the caller. 呼叫`Wait`解除鎖定指定的物件; 如果呼叫端的其他物件的鎖定擁有者，會釋放這些鎖定不。Calling `Wait` releases the lock for the specified object only; if the caller is the owner of locks on other objects, these locks are not released. > [!NOTE] > 同步處理的物件擁有數個參考，包括目前持有鎖定，參考到就緒佇列，其中包含已準備好取得鎖定的執行緒，以及參考等候佇列，其中包含執行緒的參考正在等候的物件的狀態變更通知的執行緒。A synchronized object holds several references, including a reference to the thread that currently holds the lock, a reference to the ready queue, which contains the threads that are ready to obtain the lock, and a reference to the waiting queue, which contains the threads that are waiting for notification of a change in the object's state. ， ，和`Wait`方法必須從叫用同步處理的程式碼區塊中。The , , and `Wait` methods must be invoked from within a synchronized block of code. 如 < 備註 >方法說明發生什麼事如果沒有執行緒在等候時，會呼叫。The remarks for the method explain what happens if is called when no threads are waiting.

the method is called from inside a nondefault managed context. 如果您的執行緒是衍生自類別的執行個體的呼叫在此情形。This can happen if your thread is inside a call to an instance of a class derived from . 即使您目前正在執行的方法不衍生自的類別上，例如，您可以在非預設內容中如果您目前的應用程式定義域中的堆疊上。Even if you are currently executing a method on a class that is not derived from , like , you can be in a nondefault context if a is on your stack in the current application domain. 時的非預設內容中執行您的程式碼，在指定`true`的`exitContext`造成執行緒結束的非預設的 managed 的內容 (也就是轉換成預設內容) 執行之前方法。When your code is executing in a nondefault context, specifying `true` for `exitContext` causes the thread to exit the nondefault managed context (that is, to transition to the default context) before executing the method. 它會傳回呼叫之後為原始的非預設內容方法完成。It returns to the original nondefault context after the call to the method completes. 這有助於進行內容繫結類別具有套用的屬性。This can be useful when the context-bound class has the attribute applied. 在此情況下，所有呼叫類別的成員會自動同步都處理，並同步處理領域是類別程式碼的整個主體。In that case, all calls to members of the class are automatically synchronized, and the synchronization domain is the entire body of code for the class. 如果成員的呼叫堆疊中的程式碼會呼叫方法，並指定`true`如`exitContext`，執行緒結束同步處理網域，讓執行緒上呼叫物件的任何成員，以繼續進行封鎖。If code in the call stack of a member calls the method and specifies `true` for `exitContext`, the thread exits the synchronization domain, allowing a thread that is blocked on a call to any member of the object to proceed. 當方法傳回時，進行呼叫的執行緒必須等待重新輸入一次同步處理領域。When the method returns, the thread that made the call must wait to reenter the synchronization domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不會傳回在重新取得獨佔鎖定直到`obj`參數。This method does not return until it reacquires an exclusive lock on the `obj` parameter. 目前擁有指定的物件上鎖定的執行緒叫用此方法，以便釋出物件，另一個執行緒可以存取它。The thread that currently owns the lock on the specified object invokes this method in order to release the object so that another thread can access it. 等候重新取得鎖定時，會封鎖呼叫端。The caller is blocked while waiting to reacquire the lock. 當呼叫端需要等待，因為另一個執行緒的作業而造成狀態變更時，會呼叫這個方法。This method is called when the caller needs to wait for a state change that will occur as a result of another thread's operations. 逾時可確保目前的執行緒在如果另一個執行緒釋放的鎖定，但是未先呼叫不會無限期地封鎖或方法。The time-out ensures that the current thread does not block indefinitely if another thread releases the lock without first calling the or method. 它也會在執行緒移動到就緒佇列，以便它可以更快重新取得鎖定，請略過它之前等候佇列中的其他執行緒。It also moves the thread to the ready queue, bypassing other threads ahead of it in the wait queue, so that it can reacquire the lock sooner. 執行緒可以測試的傳回值方法，以判斷它是否重新取得鎖定之前的逾時。執行緒可以評估導致它進入等候條件，才需要呼叫方法一次。The thread can test the return value of the method to determine whether it reacquired the lock prior to the time-out. The thread can evaluate the conditions that caused it to enter the wait, and if necessary call the method again. 當執行緒呼叫`Wait`，它會釋放鎖定，並進入等待佇列。When a thread calls `Wait`, it releases the lock and enters the waiting queue. 此時，就緒佇列中的下一個執行緒 （如果有的話） 允許鎖定的控制。At this point, the next thread in the ready queue (if there is one) is allowed to take control of the lock. 叫用的執行緒`Wait`仍會保留在等候佇列，直到保留鎖定的執行緒叫用，或它是在佇列中的下一步，並保留鎖定的執行緒叫用。The thread that invoked `Wait` remains in the waiting queue until either a thread that holds the lock invokes , or it is the next in the queue and a thread that holds the lock invokes . 不過，如果`timeout`另一個執行緒叫用這個物件經過毫秒或方法，原始執行緒時，會移到就緒佇列上，才能重新取得鎖定。However, if `timeout` milliseconds elapse before another thread invokes this object's or method, the original thread is moved to the ready queue in order to regain the lock. > [!NOTE] > 如果會指定代表-1 毫秒`timeout`參數，此方法會封鎖無限期地鎖定的持有者會呼叫除非或。If a representing -1 millisecond is specified for the `timeout` parameter, this method blocks indefinitely unless the holder of the lock calls or . 如果`timeout`為 0 毫秒，呼叫的執行緒`Wait`釋出鎖定，然後才能重新取得鎖定立即進入就緒佇列。If `timeout` is 0 milliseconds, the thread that calls `Wait` releases the lock and then immediately enters the ready queue in order to regain the lock. 呼叫端執行`Wait`一次，不論次數已叫用指定的物件。The caller executes `Wait` once, regardless of the number of times has been invoked for the specified object. 就概念而言，`Wait`方法將儲存在呼叫端叫用次數物件上叫用次數所需的完全釋放鎖定的物件。Conceptually, the `Wait` method stores the number of times the caller invoked on the object and invokes as many times as necessary to fully release the locked object. 呼叫端會再封鎖等候重新取得物件時。The caller then blocks while waiting to reacquire the object. 當呼叫端重新取得鎖定時，系統就會呼叫所需的還原已儲存次數呼叫端的計數。When the caller reacquires the lock, the system calls as many times as necessary to restore the saved count for the caller. 呼叫`Wait`解除鎖定指定的物件; 如果呼叫端的其他物件的鎖定擁有者，會釋放這些鎖定不。Calling `Wait` releases the lock for the specified object only; if the caller is the owner of locks on other objects, these locks are not released. > [!NOTE] > 同步處理的物件擁有數個參考，包括目前持有鎖定，參考到就緒佇列，其中包含已準備好取得鎖定的執行緒，以及參考等候佇列，其中包含執行緒的參考正在等候的物件的狀態變更通知的執行緒。A synchronized object holds several references, including a reference to the thread that currently holds the lock, a reference to the ready queue, which contains the threads that are ready to obtain the lock, and a reference to the waiting queue, which contains the threads that are waiting for notification of a change in the object's state. ， ，和`Wait`方法必須從叫用同步處理的程式碼區塊中。The , , and `Wait` methods must be invoked from within a synchronized block of code. 如 < 備註 >方法說明發生什麼事如果沒有執行緒在等候時，會呼叫。The remarks for the method explain what happens if is called when no threads are waiting. ## 在結束內容的資訊Notes on Exiting the Context `exitContext`參數沒有任何作用，除非從非預設受管理的內容中呼叫方法。The`exitContext` parameter has no effect unless the method is called from inside a nondefault managed context. 如果您的執行緒是衍生自類別的執行個體的呼叫在此情形。This can happen if your thread is inside a call to an instance of a class derived from . 即使您目前正在執行的方法不衍生自的類別上，例如，您可以在非預設內容中如果您目前的應用程式定義域中的堆疊上。Even if you are currently executing a method on a class that is not derived from , like , you can be in a nondefault context if a is on your stack in the current application domain. 時的非預設內容中執行您的程式碼，在指定`true`的`exitContext`造成執行緒結束的非預設的 managed 的內容 (也就是轉換成預設內容) 執行之前方法。When your code is executing in a nondefault context, specifying `true` for `exitContext` causes the thread to exit the nondefault managed context (that is, to transition to the default context) before executing the method. 它會傳回呼叫之後為原始的非預設內容方法完成。It returns to the original nondefault context after the call to the method completes. 這有助於進行內容繫結類別具有套用的屬性。This can be useful when the context-bound class has the attribute applied. 在此情況下，所有呼叫類別的成員會自動同步都處理，並同步處理領域是類別程式碼的整個主體。In that case, all calls to members of the class are automatically synchronized, and the synchronization domain is the entire body of code for the class. 如果成員的呼叫堆疊中的程式碼會呼叫方法，並指定`true`如`exitContext`，執行緒結束同步處理網域，讓執行緒上呼叫物件的任何成員，以繼續進行封鎖。If code in the call stack of a member calls the method and specifies `true` for `exitContext`, the thread exits the synchronization domain, allowing a thread that is blocked on a call to any member of the object to proceed. 當方法傳回時，進行呼叫的執行緒必須等待重新輸入一次同步處理領域。When the method returns, the thread that made the call must wait to reenter the synchronization domain.
